patthana8.71:1.1_0: Naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana8.71:2.1_0: Naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.71:3.1_0: Naniyyānikañca naaniyyānikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana8.71:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
